text: Now you just look at the picture and you tell me everything that's going on, okay? This is going to be like looking at those artistic things and fiddling when we get there. We're going to be at her dishwashers and her dish sink is overflowing on the floor because the faucet is running. And she's standing in it yet. Her kiddos are robbing the job and the little boy is falling off the stool. He's getting some cookies
